name: A Dirty Catastrophe
description:
CONTROLS:   WASD/ArrowKeys: Move - Z/E/LMB: Attack.

You are now in the Cat Underworld, there is no way back.... or is there? 

A mean and dirty cat on death row is executed nine times. They make a deal with cat satan to collect a cat soul in return for a 10th life and a chance for revenge.

Made in 7 days for the Whisker Game Jam.

Tilemap from https://opengameart.org/content/zelda-like-tilesets-and-sprites

Art Sprites made by Jack Oatley (https://jackoatley.itch.io/)
